title: No Sim detected - no network Google 4a
content:
No simcard / network is detected on my Google 4a. The phone is less than 6 months old and I have tried the following:

Resetting the phone. 
Removing the simcard. 
The simcard works in another phone.

This appears to be a very very common issue across the boards. I'm hoping given the frequency of the issue that there is fix or this is covered under warranty
